# The `AMDGPUMCCodeEmitter.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> code emitter produces machine code that can be executed directly on the GPU device. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> code emitter produces machine code that can be executed directly on the GPU device.

<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">      Enc &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hwencoding/#a7591861bd58475c68c3d9c2d3578daaca6a77175cc0c73497f607741802144ce5">AMDGPU::HWEncoding::IS&#95;VGPR</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hwencoding/#a7591861bd58475c68c3d9c2d3578daaca014ced34e2f4e80c4bffca6a8da0aedd">AMDGPU::HWEncoding::IS&#95;AGPR</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
